title: TravelTriangle presents best deals on customizable honeymoon package to Maldives - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
TravelTriangle presents best deals on customizable honeymoon package to Maldives Published on : Tuesday, August 11, 2015
Weddings are most cherished events of one’s life. The vows, the merriment and a hope for a lovely future make the day like no other. But, more often than not, couples hardly get time to revel in their companionship.
Worry not, that’s what honeymoon is for. To make your honeymoon even more memorable and relaxing, TravelTriangle presents a fabulous package so that you can spend time with your significant other and experience pure bliss.The ‘Superior Beach Bungalow’ of the 5 star facility, Paradise Island Resort and Spa, is as luxurious as can be and rest assured that all that pre wedding stress will vanish for good.
The place provides breathtaking view all around, and tucked in the island you can get far far away from the crowd. Enjoy awesome food and relax at the spa.
Price : Rs 86,000 for Couple (including Hotel Taxes, Maldivian Taxes, GST)
PACKAGE INCLUDES: 4 nights accommodation at Paradise Island Resort and Spa,Meals (Breakfast and Dinner), Transfer to the island by speedboat, Return airport transfer.
About TravelTriangle:
TravelTriangle,India’s first fullstack holiday tour package marketplace with a team of 150 people, an amazing product and a bouquet of 450+ expert agents across the globe.Established in October 2011, the company is the brainchild of three IIT alumni – Sankalp Agarwal (IIT Kharagpur), Sanchit Garg (IIT Bombay) and Prabhat Gupta (IIT Guwahati) – who wanted to connect travelers with safe, reliable, local and verified holiday planners in various destinations around the world.The USP of the company, undoubtedly, is its personalized approach, intelligent product and reliable fulfillment. TravelTriangle with its unique content attract around 5 lakhs of visitors on its website every month. The company has served travelers from 60 countries & the happiness quotient is reflected in the 94% positive customer reviews.
TravelTriangle connects travelers with safe, reliable, local and verified holiday planners in various destinations around the world.
We would be highly privileged if you could incorporate the same in your esteemed publication.
